content.rendered:
Directed by Aijaz Khan.

Written by Sumit Saxena.

Cast Talha Arshad Reshi(Hamid). Vikas Kumar(Abhay). Rasika Dugal(Ishrat). Sumeet Kaul(Rehmat (as Sumit Kaul)). Bashir Lone(Rasool Chacha). Veer Rajwant Singh(Rajinder (as Gurveer Singh)). Ashraf Nagoo(Basheer). Mir Sarwar(Abbas). Qazi Faiz(Beggar). Umar Adil(Police Officer) . Gunjan Sinha(Jagdeesh)

Languages Urdu. Hindi.

Producers Hussein Khan. Siddharth Anand Kumar. Shoaib Lokhandwala. Vikram Mehra. Guneet Monga. Nitin Nair. Vinod Prakash. Gaurav Sharma. Sahil Sharma.

Production Saregama India. Yoodlee Films.
